details: Launching the most advanced Robotics Fulfillment Centre in Poland as an Outbound Area Manager.
Actively coaching team members and playing a hands-on role in the recruitment process for Team Lead positions and critical roles.
Serving as a Proxy Subject Matter Expert (SME) for the AFE department, using gained knowledge to simplify processes, boost efficiency, and support the overall success of the department.
Providing support to managers on different shifts, ensuring seamless collaboration and a cohesive operational strategy across various work periods.
Leading the conception and implementation of impactful projects aimed at elevating productivity, safety, and quality on-site.
Ensuring safe working conditions and proper functioning of the store during government restrictions and store closures (lockdown due to Covid-19).
Managing human resources, supervising and directly leading the recruitment process.
Complex team management, succession plan development.
Close collaboration with the product manager and logistics department.
Planning and controlling the sales budget as well as the labor budget, creating schedules for the entire team.
Working with sales reports and organizing teamwork under pressure and time constraints.
Ensuring the commercial appearance of the store.
Providing professional customer service, overseeing the consumer complaint resolution process.
